eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED WEEKLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Indiana; AT 02:00 AM ON OCT 16, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 02:15 AM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is a test of the Indiana EAS System. This test is conducted in coordination with the Indiana Broadcasters as a public service to the citizens of Indiana.
